author: akornev
msg: fixed: session events should be processed on the completion thread; PING operation doesn’t atomically enqueue the completion and send buffers like other operations do

author: akornev
msg: fixed: get_xid() is not thread-safe (xid initialization race condition); I/O thread doesn’t automatically terminate on AUTH_FAILURE and SESSION_EXPIRED events

author: mahadevkonar
msg: fixed session ids to always be in hex
